summary: Forwards the acoustic space edits from Sounds of Skyrim to work with Enhanced Lights and FX 3.01
descriptionHtml:
Forwards the acoustic space edits from Sounds of Skyrim to work with Enhanced Lights and FX 3.01


[b]Requirements :

SoS - The Dungeons.esp
SoS - Civilization.esp
EnhancedLightsandFX.esp
[/b]
[b][i]SoS - The Wilds plays nice with ELFX and doesn't need patching.


[/i][/b]If you use Unofficial Enhanced Lights and FX SMIM ENB patch by Skysan4298 load my patch after it for SoS compatibility.[b]
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60603/?

Important note : Load every ELFX esp after Sounds of Skyrim.

[u]Not sure if i need permission from someone to upload this patch but if i do please inform me.[/u]

[/b]
author: aimoroida
